body_html:
I am experiencing the same issue with building TensorFlow 1.11.0 and 1.10.1 with CUDA 8. This issue is specific to CUDA 8 due to a conflict with the builtin functions called from abseil-cpp. Have not tried building 1.10.0.

As a work around, I was able to successfully build TensorFlow 1.10.1 by disabling the gcc builtin function preprocessor macro check via:
bazel --cxxopt="-U__has_builtin"
However, this trick does not work for building 1.11.0.

@kicksalva Thank you :)
This trick does not work for me neither, but I was able to build TF 1.10.1 without disabling any macro.

body:
> I am experiencing the same issue with building TensorFlow 1.11.0 and 1.10.1 with CUDA 8. This issue is specific to CUDA 8 due to a conflict with the builtin functions called from abseil-cpp. Have not tried building 1.10.0.
> 
> As a work around, I was able to successfully build TensorFlow 1.10.1 by disabling the gcc builtin function preprocessor macro check via:
> `bazel --cxxopt="-U__has_builtin"`
> However, this trick does not work for building 1.11.0.

@kicksalva  Thank you :)
This trick does not work for me neither, but I was able to build TF 1.10.1 without disabling any macro.
